channel.title: BUbuisnessAndMarket
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from BUbuisnessAndMarket, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: The protein craze is heavy metal, literally: bombshell investigation finds unsafe lead amounts in two-thirds of top powders for sale
item.description: Paris Martineau said Consumer Reports found “concerning levels” of heavy metals in a 2010 investigation, but the risks have been growing ever since.

item.title: Meet the Resy CMO using data to shape your next great meal
item.description: Resy is pursuing a marketing strategy that turns restaurant data into cultural currency.

item.title: Ron Conway skewers Mark Benioff in board resignation after 25 years: ‘I now barely recognize the person I have so long admired’
item.description: "San Francisco does not need a federal invasion because you don’t like paying for extra security for Dreamforce," Conway said.

item.title: LVMH CEO Bernard Arnault sees wealth skyrocket by $19 billion overnight after months of bleeding billions as shoppers trade designer bags for luxury vacations
item.description: It may be a difficult climb for the LVMH chairman to claw back to his January high of $209 billion as researchers project a 3-year slowdown in luxury ...

item.title: This 26-year-old’s TikTok-like AI app makes playful, creative short videos from just a few words—it’s built for Gen Z
item.description: Pika, Demi Guo's fast-growing AI video app, is taking on Meta’s Vibes and OpenAI’s Sora by turning quick prompts and selfies into shareable clips.

item.title: Dow, S&P, Nasdaq all dive into the red as U.S. stocks reverse early gains — live
Dow ends 300 points lower as concerns around bad bank loans spark stock selloff
Dow losing over 400 points in final half-hour as bank-loan jitters spark selloff
Official data hugely underreports hedge funds' Treasury holdings, Fed says
Regional-bank stocks fall as Zions's $50M loss shows another credit 'cockroach'
